channel.title: Misc on Cédric Scherer
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Cédric Scherer

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hi, I am glad you found your way here! Come in, have a look. I finally managed to set up a personal homepage - and how easy it was! Huge thanks to the developers of the R package blogdown Yihui Xie, Amber Thomas and Alison Presmanes Hill and the open-source Hugo framework. Much thanks also to Huabing Zhao for sharing his “Clean White” theme! Header image © Negative Space
